title: Darunthar d'Kundarak
text: Warden Darunthar d’[[Kundarak]] is an [[artificer]] in charge of maintaining and improving [[Dreadhold]]’s magical security systems. Darunthar is remarkably hyperactive for a [[dwarf]]. He remains in constant motion, fidgeting if he has to stay in one place for more than a minute. Like his co-warden [[Oralys d'Kundarak]], he has a permanent [[telepathic bond]] to Lord Warden [[Zaxon|Zaxon d'Kundarak]].
